title: So how's Warwick right now?
body:
Just had a game and didn't do too well (though it was mostly due to them snowballing early off lanes), he is hella more fun but I can't tell how he is currently. What do you guys think?

I will play him more in the future due to how much more fun he is but eh, I'm not too sure whether he's worth playing to win for.

{{champion:19}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:19}}  (omg still old WW icon)

replies.body: I can't tell bc he is 100% ban rate.
He's worth playing to win with. I love this guy. Malicious Metal, if you see this, Warwick is gonna be my mordekaiser!
